tool_description: Creates fixed-size text chunks from input text using specified chunk size and step parameters.

chunk_size.description: Size of each chunk in characters (100-10000)

pad_last_chunk.description: Whether to include the last chunk if it's smaller than chunk_size

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text content for chunking.
Invalid chunk size: Chunk size must be between 100 and 10000 characters.
Invalid step size: Step size must be between 1 and chunk_size.
Text too short: Text must be at least as long as the chunk size.
usage: Provide text_content, chunk_size, and step_size. Optionally configure padding behavior. Returns array of fixed-size text chunks.

average_chunk_size.description: Average size of chunks in characters
